nodes.text: Roos Londabir was a male Rodian scoundrel who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. In about 31 BBY, Londabir offered to help Dersa Welles, the leader of a criminal organization known as the Intarsa League, to established a shell company. Welles acceppted his offer and Londabir agreed to meet with Welles and the League on the planet Genarius, to complete some paperwork in relation to the company. However, during his meeting with Welles, the Intarsa League were attacked by a rival criminal faction and Londabir was killed during a round of blaster fire.
